all_variations.title: üìä Movie Night Voting!
all_variations.description:
Welcome to another Movie Night voting! Below are this week's selection of movies to choose from.
Your movie could be on there next too! Go to <#736683960062574635> and let us know your favourite movie!

Click on the reactions below to choose the one you'd love to watch!

messages.embed_preview_message: This is a preview of the embed that'll be sent. The reactions will be added on time of posting!
messages.on_ok: The voting message will be sent shortly!
messages.on_cancel: Welp. Start again I guess? dum bish
messages.on_timeout: Guess you needed more time eh?
messages.message_on_finish: This Movie Night voting has ended!
messages.owner_message_on_finish: The Movie Night voting has ended!

embed_texts.title: Movie-Night Vote Count
embed_texts.description: Here are the current votes for the movie night!
